participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and determined, always striving for the best.
participant_1.background: I keep my clothes clean but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case. I live on a lake. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up. I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection. Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and cheerful, with a love for nature and animals.
participant_2.background: I have a pet dog named Sunshine who loves to play in my sunflower field. I am a huge fan of baseball. Christmas is my favorite holiday. I was born completely deaf. I find that my childhood cartoons inspire me to be more creative.

content.text: I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
I also love the suburbs, my house is right next to a sunflower field and my dog loves to play there.
That sounds like a great place to live.
It is, I love it here.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Sunshine.
I wish I could have a dog but I live in an apartment and I can't have pets.
That's too bad, dogs are great companions.
I like a lot of different movies but my favorite is probably The Princess Bride.
You should check it out, it's a really good movie.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
